document_data.name: Keel Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Keel Hall''' was a festhall located in the middle level of [[Skullport]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The hall was closed down after the [[Spellplague]] struck [[Toril]] in the {{YearlinkName|1385}}, and never reopened its doors. In the following years, the abandoned building was used as a hideout by members of the [[Zhentarim]].
